snippet: Mort Engelberg, not a marrying man, and Helaine Blatt, who “didn’t need to get married,” dated for 26 years before their wedding....
abstract: Vows column on wedding of Helaine Blatt and Mort Engelberg.

byline.contributor: Noah Gilbert contributed reporting from Beverly Hills, Calif.

lead_paragraph: Mort Engelberg, not a marrying man, and Helaine Blatt, who “didn’t need to get married,” dated for 26 years before their wedding.

headline.main: A Match Made in Hollywood (and Endorsed by Bill Clinton)
